name: full-restore
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores HP to full and cures any status ailment and confusion.
short_effect: Restores HP to full and cures any status ailment and confusion.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Fully restores the HP and status of a POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: Fully restores the HP and status of a POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A medicine that fully restores the HP and heals any status problems of one POKéMON.
